AllText.heroDescription: An aspiring learner who is always curious to learn new things, experiment, look for solutions and grab opportunities! Currently, I am focused on
AllText.AboutParaOne: Hello! My name is Nishant Joshi and i enjoy making things on web. I also know basics of app development but my main intrest is on web development. My intrest started way back when i started my BSc IT in 2015 from DG Ruparel college. Then, I completed MSc in Computer Science from Ramnarain Ruia Autonomous college. MSc exposed me to various new technologies such as data science, data mining, blockchain, AI, ML, etc.
AllText.AboutParaTwo: During all these years, I got a chance to do around 15 projects / demonstrations which included writeups, mini projects, final year projects. In this portfolio I've also added demos that are chosen and made by myself. Currently I've experience of 6 months of working as a NodeJS backend developer intern in Finclusion Solutions Pvt Ltd. It's financial consulting and IT solution providing company based in Andheri, Mumbai.
AllText.AboutParaThree: During the intern period, I've worked on APIs, Databases, modelling digrams, etc.

projects.Title: Cloud Based Vehicle Surveillance System
projects.Description: Client app made in Python detects & alerts driver's drowsiness, obstacles, etc. Also uploads & display clips of these occurences on a website.

projects.Title: Virtual Keypad using vanilla Javascript
projects.Description: Keypad that we use on banking websites as a security measure. Many features such as jumbling of keys after reload and tab change.

projects.Title: Data storage (CRUD) using Ethereum Smart Contracts
projects.Description: As a blockchain based project, a website which interacts with ethereum smart contracts to store criminal data. Thus maintaining data decentralization and itegrity

projects.Title: Covid 19 Tracker using R Shiny
projects.Description: As a part of Big Data syllabus, a web application to visualize covid waves in a very interactive manner.

projects.Title: Climate Change Analysis & visualization
projects.Description: As a part of Advanced Mining Techinques syllabus, wrote a python script to interactively visualize data using maps.

projects.Title: Desktop app for bruteforcing social media sites
projects.Description: App which uses combination of alphabets or dictionary to brute force attack login pages.
